Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Green Line trains continue to experience delays due to a track switching problem near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to a track switching problem near Clark/Lake. Green Line trains will be rerouted to the inner Loop (Pink Line Side).

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
